DataElement.preferredName: Surgical Procedure Breast Reconstruction Performed Breast Reconstruction Performed Status
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The status related to surgery to rebuild a breast's shape after a mastectomy, as a treatment procedure performed by manual and/or instrumental means, being performed.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to the surgery to rebuild a breast's shape after a mastectomy, as a treatment procedure performed by manual and/or instrumental means, being performed.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Used for operative procedures on organs, regions, or tissues in the treatment of diseases, including tissue section by lasers. It excludes transplantation, for which "transplantation" is used.

Concepts.definition: A diagnostic or treatment procedure performed by manual and/or instrumental means, often involving an incision and the removal or replacement of a diseased organ or tissue; of or relating to or involving or used in surgery or requiring or amenable to treatment by surgery.

Property.preferredDefinition: Surgery to rebuild a breast's shape after a mastectomy.:Performed; carried out.

Concepts.definition: Surgical reconstruction of the breast.
Executed and carried through to completion.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: actions or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process (NCI).

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: 3/15/22 jk added RS; CDE 6756366 being released.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: A condition or state at a particular time.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: To possess every necessary or normal part or component or step; having come or been brought to a conclusion.

Concepts.definition: To possess every necessary or normal part or component or step; having come or been brought to a conclusion.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Planned; devised, contrived, or formed in design.

Concepts.definition: To devise, contrive, or form in design.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: An operation in which a term denies or inverts the meaning of another term or construction.: Planned; devised, contrived, or formed in design.

Concepts.definition: An operation in which a term denies or inverts the meaning of another term or construction.
To devise, contrive, or form in design.

PermissibleValues.value: No reconstruction or TE placed at time of mastectomy

ValueMeaning.preferredName: No Reconstructive Surgery Or Breast Tissue Expander At Time Mastectomy
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.: Surgical restoration of function or form of a part.: An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise.: An inflatable reservoir that is used to expand the remaining breast skin after a mastectomy and prior to surgical reconstruction.: Used to indicate position, location, or state.: The continuum of experience in which events pass from the future through the present to the past.: Surgical removal of the breast.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.
Surgical restoration of function or form of a part.

An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise.
An inflatable reservoir that is used to expand the remaining breast skin after a mastectomy and prior to surgical reconstruction.
Used to indicate position, location, or state.
The continuum of experience in which events pass from the future through the present to the past.
Surgical removal of the breast.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Not permanent; not lasting; lacking continuity or regularity.: An inflatable reservoir that is used to expand the remaining breast skin after a mastectomy and prior to surgical reconstruction.: The act of putting something into a position or location.: Used to indicate position, location, or state.: Surgical removal of the breast.
